attributes.action: disclose the nature of the offence that John Venables has committed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: John Venables has committed a serious offence by breaching his license terms. As a nation we feel that the crime he has committed should be made public. James' Mum, Denise, warned that the offenders would reoffend

rejection.details: This Office cannot comment on individual cases.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
